Title: Whatever work is work aiming to complete and not to fail the Five Year Plan, all that work is glorious!
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The worker operates a Chinese typewriter, containing a set of characters, cast in metal. An arm with a pointer is moved over the table of characters to make a selection, and the press of a lever causes the corresponding character to be lifted and struck onto the paper.In the background is a poster by Cai Zhenhua: Socialism is our goal, it is our direction!, March 1956.
